metadata.Title: CVE-2021-40330 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: git_connect_git in connect.c in Git before 2.30.1 allows a repository path to contain a newline character, which may result in unexpected cross-protocol requests, as demonstrated by the git://localhost:1234/%0d%0a%0d%0aGET%20/%20HTTP/1.1 substring.

criterions.comment: git: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
